top.title: Trump says world has 10 days to see if Iran agrees deal or 'bad things happen'
top.summary: The US is surging forces to the Middle East amid negotiations with the Islamic Republic over its nuclear programme.

top.title: Sudan atrocities are 'hallmarks of genocide', UN says
top.summary: A UN fact-finding mission issued the report after investigating the capture of el-Fasher by the Rapid Support Forces.

top.title: Grey's Anatomy star Eric Dane dies at 53 after ALS diagnosis
top.summary: The actor, who also starred in HBO's Euphoria, battled the most common form of motor neurone disease.

top.title: Starmer 'appeasing' big tech firms, says online safety campaigner
top.summary: Baroness Kidron tells the BBC the PM has being "late to the party" in regulating social media.

top.title: Microsoft error sees confidential emails exposed to AI tool Copilot
top.summary: The company says it has addressed the issue and it "did not provide anyone access to information they weren't already authorised to see".

top.title: Nasa boss says Boeing Starliner failure one of worst in its history
top.summary: The agency released a critical report that puts the Starliner incident at same mistake level assigned to the fatal Columbia and Challenger shuttle disasters.
